title: Coping
description:
Susanna Lee, Avery Williams and Rosie May share stories about sex work, a racially loaded moment, and a fateful paycheck.

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Orlando Julius, Agoria, Blasé, Rosie May, DMA's, Jozem, Kevin Allison, Avery Williams, Susanna Lee)
